```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}


colnames(PMAGY_Monitorable_Indicators_under_each_domain)=PMAGY_Monitorable_Indicators_under_each_domain[1,]
PMAGY_Monitorable_Indicators_under_each_domain=PMAGY_Monitorable_Indicators_under_each_domain[-1,]


```


```{r}
Beneficiaries.Data <- read.csv("~/Downloads/Beneficiaries Data.csv")
Beneficiaries.Data[Beneficiaries.Data$Saturated.Beneficiary == "NULL",12]=0

Beneficiaries.Data=Beneficiaries.Data %>%
  merge(PMAGY_Monitorable_Indicators_under_each_domain%>%type.convert(as.is=T)%>%select(2,3,4,5,6),by.x ="Monitorable.Indicator.1" ,by.y ="Monitorable Indicator ID" ,all.x = TRUE)

```

```{r}
Village.Works.Data=Village.Works.Data %>%
  merge(PMAGY_Monitorable_Indicators_under_each_domain%>%type.convert(as.is=T)%>%select(2,3,4,6),by.x ="Monitorable.Indicator.1" ,by.y ="Monitorable Indicator ID" ,all.x = TRUE)

colnames(Village.Works.Data)

Village.Works.Data[Village.Works.Data$No..of.works.in.progress.excluding.completed=="NULL",12]=0
Village.Works.Data[Village.Works.Data$No..of.works.completed=="NULL",13]=0

Village.Works.Data$No..of.works.in.progress.excluding.completed=as.numeric(Village.Works.Data$No..of.works.in.progress.excluding.completed)
Village.Works.Data$No..of.works.completed=as.numeric(Village.Works.Data$No..of.works.completed)
```


```{r}
Beneficiaries.Data%>%type.convert(as.is=T)%>%
  group_by(`Domain and Name`,Monitorable.Indicator)%>%
  summarise(total_beneficiaries_identified=sum(Beneficiaries.identified),
            total_beneficiaries_saturated=sum(Saturated.Beneficiary),
            prop_saturation=(total_beneficiaries_saturated*100)/total_beneficiaries_identified)



Beneficiaries.Data%>%type.convert(as.is=T)%>%
  group_by(state.Name,District.Name)%>%count()%>%group_by(state.Name)%>%count()
  summarise(total_beneficiaries_identified=sum(Beneficiaries.identified),
            total_beneficiaries_saturated=sum(Saturated.Beneficiary))


```

```{r}
Village.Works.Data%>%
  group_by(`Domain and Name`,Monitorable.Indicator)%>%
  summarise(total_prjects_identifed=sum(No..of.works.identified.for.execution),
            total_prjects_inprogress=sum(No..of.works.in.progress.excluding.completed),
            total_projects_completed=sum(No..of.works.completed),
            prop_projects_completed=(total_projects_completed*100)/total_prjects_identifed,
            prop_projects_inprogress=(total_prjects_inprogress*100)/total_prjects_identifed,
            total_prjects_notstarted=(100 - (prop_projects_completed+prop_projects_inprogress)))

Village.Works.Data%>%
  group_by(State.Name,`Domain and Name`)%>%
  summarise(total_prjects_identifed=sum(No..of.works.identified.for.execution),
            total_prjects_inprogress=sum(No..of.works.in.progress.excluding.completed),
            total_projects_completed=sum(No..of.works.completed))
```
